name: SPINDLE
description: SPINDLE is the official utility token to be used on the blockchain-based investment / asset management platform SPINDLE, a comprehensive space which aims to act as a gateway creating access to various investment options at a high level of transparency. SPINDLE believes that establishing a fair relationship between investors and asset managers is the best way to remove investorsâ€™ vague sense of unease about investment and encourage involvement in proactive asset management. With this in mind, SPINDLE aims to serve as a bridge providing transparent access to cryptocurrency fund investment for individual users, and extended exposure to cryptocurrency fund managers.
